name: Webhook
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when a webhook is called
natural_language_description: 这是 Webhook 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when a webhook is called

multipleMethods.name: multipleMethods
multipleMethods.description: Whether to allow the webhook to listen for multiple HTTP methods
multipleMethods.natural_language_description: 参数名: Allow Multiple HTTP Methods | 作用: Whether to allow the webhook to listen for multiple HTTP methods | 默认值: False

httpMethod.name: httpMethod
httpMethod.description: The HTTP methods to listen to
httpMethod.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTTP Methods | 作用: The HTTP methods to listen to | 默认值: ['GET', 'POST']
available_options: DELETE (值: DELETE)
GET (值: GET)
HEAD (值: HEAD)
PATCH (值: PATCH)
POST (值: POST)
PUT (值: PUT)

path.name: path
path.description: The path to listen to, dynamic values could be specified by using ':', e.g. 'your-path/:dynamic-value'. If dynamic values are set 'webhookId' would be prepended to path.
path.natural_language_description: 参数名: Path | 作用: The path to listen to, dynamic values could be specified by using ':', e.g. 'your-path/:dynamic-value'. If dynamic values are set 'webhookId' would be prepended to path.

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: The way to authenticate | 默认值: none
available_options: Basic Auth (值: basicAuth)
Header Auth (值: headerAuth)
JWT Auth (值: jwtAuth)
None (值: none)

responseMode.name: responseMode
responseMode.description: When and how to respond to the webhook
responseMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Respond | 作用: When and how to respond to the webhook | 默认值: onReceived
available_options: Immediately (值: onReceived) - As soon as this node executes
When Last Node Finishes (值: lastNode) - Returns data of the last-executed node
Using 'Respond to Webhook' Node (值: responseNode) - Response defined in that node
Streaming (值: streaming) - Returns data in real time from streaming enabled nodes

webhookNotice.displayName: Insert a 'Respond to Webhook' node to control when and how you respond. More details
webhookNotice.name: webhookNotice
webhookNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Insert a 'Respond to Webhook' node to control when and how you respond. More details

webhookStreamingNotice.displayName: Insert a node that supports streaming (e.g. 'AI Agent') and enable streaming to stream directly to the response while the workflow is executed. More details
webhookStreamingNotice.name: webhookStreamingNotice
webhookStreamingNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Insert a node that supports streaming (e.g. 'AI Agent') and enable streaming to stream directly to the response while the workflow is executed. More details

responseCode.name: responseCode
responseCode.description: The HTTP Response code to return
responseCode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Code | 作用: The HTTP Response code to return | 默认值: 200

responseData.name: responseData
responseData.description: What data should be returned. If it should return all items as an array or only the first item as object.
responseData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Data | 作用: What data should be returned. If it should return all items as an array or only the first item as object. | 默认值: firstEntryJson
available_options: All Entries (值: allEntries) - Returns all the entries of the last node. Always returns an array.
First Entry JSON (值: firstEntryJson) - Returns the JSON data of the first entry of the last node. Always returns a JSON object.
First Entry Binary (值: firstEntryBinary) - Returns the binary data of the first entry of the last node. Always returns a binary file.
No Response Body (值: noData) - Returns without a body

responseBinaryPropertyName.name: responseBinaryPropertyName
responseBinaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary property to return
responseBinaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Property Name | 作用: Name of the binary property to return | 默认值: data | (必填项)

contentTypeNotice.displayName: If you are sending back a response, add a "Content-Type" response header with the appropriate value to avoid unexpected behavior
contentTypeNotice.name: contentTypeNotice
contentTypeNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: If you are sending back a response, add a "Content-Type" response header with the appropriate value to avoid unexpected behavior

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowedOrigins (值: None) - Comma-separated list of URLs allowed for cross-origin non-preflight requests. Use * (default) to allow all origins.
binaryData (值: None) - Whether the webhook will receive binary data
binaryPropertyName (值: None) - The name of the output field to put any binary file data in. Only relevant if binary data is received.
ignoreBots (值: None) - Whether to ignore requests from bots like link previewers and web crawlers
ipWhitelist (值: None) - Comma-separated list of allowed IP addresses. Leave empty to allow all IPs.
noResponseBody (值: None) - Whether to send any body in the response
responsePropertyName (值: None) - Name of the property to return the data of instead of the whole JSON
binaryPropertyName (值: None) - If the data gets received via "Form-Data Multipart" it will be the prefix and a number starting with 0 will be attached to it
rawBody (值: None) - Raw body (binary)
rawBody (值: None) - Whether to return the raw body
responseCode (值: None)
responseContentType (值: None) - Set a custom content-type to return if another one as the "application/json" should be returned
responseData (值: None) - Custom response data to send
responseHeaders (值: None) - Add headers to the webhook response
